page.title: 14HOMELIFE/SUPERSTITION-EGMERE
page.content: People live in{small isolated clusters and generally prefer this. A car is necessary as there are few amenities. Most liked indoor hobbies - reading and handicrafts. Nearly every adult liked gardening but sports facilities are several miles distant. People take regular shopping trips to a large town and go to nearer shops for occasional purchases. Most families prefer{'good, {plain' food;}home grown veg.as part of the diet.{Pets}are kept: cats(the most popular), dogs, goldfish and chickens. One person kept pigeons, another ferrets. Only four families would admit to being{superstitious.}They felt that a death would follow bringing hawthorn indoors. Black- berries must not be eaten in October when the Devil flies over them. Some say the Baskerville Hounds haunt the area. No ghosts were reported.
